subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Mike Repole, who owns Stay Thirsty and Uncle Mo, was able to exhale after Stay Thirsty won the Travers to move to the top of the 3-year-old class.
snippet: Mike Repole, who owns Stay Thirsty and Uncle Mo, was able to exhale after Stay Thirsty won the Travers to move to the top of the 3-year-old class.
